plot: Wracked with guilt for the crimes of his past, a haunted man must choose between his orders and his conscience to save what's left of his soul.
title: The Devil's Due
plot_es: Wracked with guilt for the crimes of his past, a haunted man must choose between his orders and his conscience to save what's left of his soul.
plot_en: Wracked with guilt for the crimes of his past, a haunted man must choose between his orders and his conscience to save what's left of his soul.
